name: Pravda
description:
A Short Horror Game Prototype, developed by Justin Keever, Cody Owens, Rachel Cianfichi, and Haiwei Chen. Made for Comm 690 in the Fall of 2015 at the University of North Carolina, using repurposed assets from Fallout 3, Half-Life 2, and Eidolon, in addition to custom assets developed specifically for this project. Developed in Unity 4.

Inspired by First Person Walkers like Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs, PT, and the Penumbra Series

Some tips for playing:

-The notes on the door and the refrigerator must be read before the apartment can be exited.

-Press 'F' to turn on the flashlight.

-The door to the room with the power switch in the 2nd section of the Power Plant is locked. The key is in a room at the end of the hall.
